categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Dodger was a Nebulon-B frigate used by the Rebel Alliance. The ship arrived to attack 3 BFF-1 bulk freighters Rugle with multiple Rebel starfighters. The attack was thwarted by two Assault Gunboats. The attack was recorded and used in the Combat chamber to train future pilots on the Gunboat. One of them was Maarek Stele.

The frigate appears on the 1994 game Star Wars: TIE Fighter in the Combat chamber Mission 4 training mission. As the mission in question is based on historical events, it is unclear what happened to the Dodger outside the Combat chamber.
The frigate can be destroyed by the player as part of one of two "Bonus objectives", the other is the destruction of the Shuttle Leap.
